channel.title: wallpapers on a2n-s' Personal Website & Blog

item.title: nitrogen
item.description: Go back to the dotfiles, the doc or the front page. a wallpaper manager. Some resources. the arch wiki page here. a youtube tutorial here. Dependencies for nitrogen. some wallpapers to load and restore. mine currently is a vibrant scene. Install nitrogen manually. install the dependencies. install the nitrogen command. copy nitrogen.cfg inside your ~/.config/nitrogen directory. Gallery. Available soon. Snippets on the dotfiles repo.
item.content:
Go back to the dotfiles, the doc or the front page.

a wallpaper manager.

Some resources.

  • the arch wiki page here.
  • a youtube tutorial here.

Dependencies for nitrogen.

  • some wallpapers to load and restore.
  • mine currently is a vibrant scene.

Install nitrogen manually.

  • install the dependencies.
  • install the nitrogen command.
  • copy nitrogen.cfg inside your ~/.config/nitrogen directory.

Gallery.

Available soon.
Snippets on the dotfiles repo.

Go back to the dotfiles, the doc or the front page.
